thread.title: Ground News - North Yorkshire rugby club's recruitment proves successful with 100 new sign-ups
thread.title_full: Ground News - North Yorkshire rugby club's recruitment proves successful with 100 new sign-ups

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - North Yorkshire rugby club's recruitment proves successful with 100 new sign-ups
text:
Summary by Ground News Thirsk Rugby Club saw a drop off in coaches and children returning after the Covid lockdowns. Chairman Dave Wood said a plan was launched to ensure a generation didn’t miss out. The club has fixed subscription at just £50 a year and with the help of a £500 grant from Broadacres and a group of dedicated volunteers, it been able to provide posts for the new pitch.
